item.title: Nvidia Acquires Run:ai to Boost AI Infrastructure Efficiency
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Nvidia had recently acquired Run:ai, an Israeli startup specializing in AI workload management. This move underscores the increasing significance of Kubernetes in generative AI. Through this, Nvidia aims to address the challenges associated with GPU resource utilization in AI infrastructure. Let’s delve into the details of this acquisition and its implications for the AI and […]
item.content:encoded:
Nvidia had recently acquired Run:ai, an Israeli startup specializing in AI workload management. This move underscores the increasing significance of Kubernetes in generative AI. Through this, Nvidia aims to address the challenges associated with GPU resource utilization in AI infrastructure. Let’s delve into the details of this acquisition and its implications for the AI and […]

The post Nvidia Acquires Run:ai to Boost AI Infrastructure Efficiency appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Apple Introduces OpenELM: Open-Source AI Models for On-Device Processing
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Apple has recently unveiled OpenELM, a family of open-source language models optimized for on-device processing. This model has been made open source, encouraging free usage and collaboration. Apple’s move towards transparency aims to empower developers and researchers while enhancing user privacy. Let’s find out more about this new release. Also Read: Apple Boosts AI Capabilities […]
item.content:encoded:
Apple has recently unveiled OpenELM, a family of open-source language models optimized for on-device processing. This model has been made open source, encouraging free usage and collaboration. item.title: New Chinese Model Outperforms GPT-4 Turbo!
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: SenseTime, a leading AI company based in China, has launched its latest model, SenseNova 5.0, marking a significant advancement in artificial intelligence. This new model has been shown to outperform many powerful large language models, including GPT-4 Turbo. Despite the lack of buzz surrounding its release, it looks promising in revolutionizing various industries with its […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Meet Malar, India’s First Autonomous AI Professor
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Two months after Kerala got its first AI teacher, Chennai researchers have developed the country’s first AI Professor! “Malar Teacher,” as she is named, is said to be the world’s first autonomous AI university professor. Malar is fully trained on the complete engineering syllabus of Anna University, ushering in a new era of teaching. This […]
item.content:encoded:
Two months after Kerala got its first AI teacher, Chennai researchers have developed the country’s first AI Professor! “Malar Teacher,” as she is named, is said to be the world’s first autonomous AI university professor. Malar is fully trained on the complete engineering syllabus of Anna University, ushering in a new era of teaching. This […]

The post Meet Malar, India’s First Autonomous AI Professor appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Convert Blurry Videos to HD with Adobe’s New AI
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Adobe’s latest innovation in AI technology, VideoGigaGAN, promises to revolutionize video upscaling by enhancing resolution without compromising on quality. With its new approach, Adobe aims to address the longstanding challenges of blurry videos. It presents a solution that offers remarkable results in converting blurry videos into HD. Let’s find out more about its features and […]
item.content:encoded:
